name: houfy-assets
description: Local dev environment for SkyforestGetaway with Houfy proxy

scripts.dev: npm run build:js && concurrently --kill-others -n worker,bs,tunnel -c green,magenta,blue "npm:worker:local" "npm:bs" "npm:tunnel"
scripts.deploy:uat: npm run build:js && wrangler deploy --config wrangler.uat.toml
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build:js && wrangler deploy --config wrangler.prod.toml
